page.title: 11PLACES OF WORK FOR RESIDENTS
page.content:
Although the block once had a number of large firms providing employment many have closed in recent years. Today few people living in the block actually work in the block, most travel to other towns to work. A questionnaire of people showed where people worked:
Manchester and Salford 50% Bury 25% Whitefield 6% Bolton 5% Radcliffe 3% Swinton 3% Other 8%
Other included Blackpool, Crumpsall, Gorton, Middleton,Prestwich and Liverpool. The excellent communications make the block very popular.
